Question
========

The average of five numbers equals 10. The number 0 is added to the five numbers. The average of the six numbers is then

Answerlist
----------

* Equal to 10
* Greater than 10
* Less than 10

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Equal to 10: Incorrect
* Greater than 10: Incorrect
* Less than 10: Correct
